title: Mini-Ep 62: Confidence Songs with Samee Junio
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 62: Confidence Songs with Samee Junio
itunes:subtitle: On this week's mini-ep Kate is joined by Forever35 producer extraordinaire Samee Junio, who helps field listener questions and comments. They discuss the joy of using Q-tips and debate their intended purpose, offer advice about self-care whilst de...
description:
On this week's mini-ep Kate is joined by Forever35 producer extraordinaire Samee Junio, who helps field listener questions and comments. They discuss the joy of using Q-tips and debate their intended purpose, offer advice about self-care whilst dealing with career rejection, and respond to a listener struggling with guilt for living far away from their parents.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Daily Harvest - Go to daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FOREVER35 to get three cups FREE in your first box.
  • Simple Contacts - Go to simplecontacts.com/forever20 or enter the code FOREVER20 at checkout to get $20 off your first order.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
